page.title: 14A Day in the Life of Rachael
page.content: My name is Rachael Stone.I live in Ferndale Road.I get up at 8 o'clock,get dressed and have breakfast.I normally have toast.Then I get ready for school.I go to Gorse Hill Junior School.I go into school and hang my coat up in the cloakroom.First we have reading and then we go to assembly.We sing and say prayers in assembly.After, we have Maths and then it's playtime.After, we have more work and at 12.10 we stop for dinner.I go home to have dinner and I go back at 1 o'clock.At 3 o'clock we go home.I watch television until tea-time at 5 o'clock.After tea I play games until I go to bed at 8.30p.m.
